channel.title: This is getting really annoying
channel.description:
So I've had to download SCAR like 8 times, and SRL like 5 times because it hasn't worked every time.
But every script I use has a million errors. I've looked at plenty tutorials, and have done each step exactly as said. Only I get an error instead of it working.
Can someone help me?

item.title: This is getting really annoying
item.dc:creator: @winteraven winteraven
item.description:
@winteraven wrote:

I’ve used a bunch.
Most from this site, the most recent topics.
Mining ones.

But also when I try to get the list of up-to-date includes from SCAR itself, it says “Error while obtaining Includes List!”
Every time I’ve downloaded it, it says that.

I’ve also extracted/downloaded the list of includes that Starblaster posted.
I changed the options on SCAR to get the includes from the file that I extracted the includes to.
Still didn’t work.

The errors are just stuff like certain .txt files are missing.
But that can’t be right because I downloaded them and redirected to that source.
Before, it didn’t register certain coding.

I would just like to get a script that works.
Preferrably Mining/Banking (Ore AND essence. Two different scripts) and magic casting.

Read full topic

item.title: This is getting really annoying
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

What error do you get?

Is the script you use a fairly new one? Old scripts don’t work anymore, because they use outdated includes.

Read full topic
